languages.text: {n}Сквозь стук колотящегося сердца вы слышите голос Злобы, доносящийся издалека:{/n} "Ладно, заштопайте людишко. Он{mf||а} оказал{mf|ся|ась} полезнее всех вас вместе взятых".
{n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Fine, patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She}'s proven to be more useful than the rest of you put together."
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь стук колотящегося сердца вы слышите голос Злобы, доносящийся издалека:{/n} "Ладно, заштопайте людишко. Он{mf||а} оказал{mf|ся|ась} полезнее всех вас вместе взятых".

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Fine, patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She}'s proven to be more useful than the rest of you put together."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Fine, patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She}'s proven to be more useful than the rest of you put together."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}通过心脏的跳动，你听到恶棍的声音从遥远的地方传了过来。{/n}“好了，给这个小人儿包扎一下。说真的，{mf|他|她}比你们剩下所有人加起来都有用。”
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Fine, patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She}'s proven to be more useful than the rest of you put together."

traits.locale_text: {n}通过心脏的跳动，你听到恶棍的声音从遥远的地方传了过来。{/n}“好了，给这个小人儿包扎一下。说真的，{mf|他|她}比你们剩下所有人加起来都有用。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Por encima del tambor de tu corazón, oyes la voz lejana de Malicia:{/n} «De acuerdo, tratad a{mf|l| la} human{mf|o|a}. A fin de cuentas, ha sido más útil que todos vosotros juntos».
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Fine, patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She}'s proven to be more useful than the rest of you put together."

traits.locale_text: {n}Por encima del tambor de tu corazón, oyes la voz lejana de Malicia:{/n} «De acuerdo, tratad a{mf|l| la} human{mf|o|a}. A fin de cuentas, ha sido más útil que todos vosotros juntos».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}心臓の鼓動の合間に、遠くからマリスの声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「仕方ない、この人間を手当てしろ。お前たちが束になってもこいつのほうがよほど使い道がありそうだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Fine, patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She}'s proven to be more useful than the rest of you put together."

traits.locale_text: {n}心臓の鼓動の合間に、遠くからマリスの声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「仕方ない、この人間を手当てしろ。お前たちが束になってもこいつのほうがよほど使い道がありそうだ」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Über das Getrommel deines Herzens hörst du Tückes Stimme irgendwo aus der Ferne:{/n} "Schön, flickt den Menschling zusammen. {mf|Er|Sie} hat sich als nützlicher erwiesen als Ihr alle zusammen."
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Fine, patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She}'s proven to be more useful than the rest of you put together."

traits.locale_text: {n}Über das Getrommel deines Herzens hörst du Tückes Stimme irgendwo aus der Ferne:{/n} "Schön, flickt den Menschling zusammen. {mf|Er|Sie} hat sich als nützlicher erwiesen als Ihr alle zusammen."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Sous les battements de votre cœur, vous entendez la voix de Démon au loin :{/n} « Bon, remettez l'{mf|humain|humaine} sur pied. {mf|Il|Elle} a prouvé qu'{mf|il|elle} était plus utile que vous tous réunis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Fine, patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She}'s proven to be more useful than the rest of you put together."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous les battements de votre cœur, vous entendez la voix de Démon au loin :{/n} « Bon, remettez l'{mf|humain|humaine} sur pied. {mf|Il|Elle} a prouvé qu'{mf|il|elle} était plus utile que vous tous réunis. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Kalp atışlarının arasında Melanet'in uzaktan gelen sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Tamam, insancığın yaralarına bir bakın. Ne de olsa hepinizin toplamından daha çok işime yarıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Fine, patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She}'s proven to be more useful than the rest of you put together."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalp atışlarının arasında Melanet'in uzaktan gelen sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Tamam, insancığın yaralarına bir bakın. Ne de olsa hepinizin toplamından daha işlevli."
traits.speaker: Anger
